about_the_game:
Pestilence is a first-person stealth game in which you play as the Lord of the Pestilence, a betrayed God who seeks revenge against his brothers.
To accomplish this, you will need to kill your brothers' Judges, the ruling caste of the city of Trumana. You will traverse the town's shadows as a malevolent force, using your uncanny ability to possess and sow chaos between its people.

FEATURES

Find your next host

Take advantage of your possession powers to infiltrate Trumana's souls, becoming the puppeteer of their destiny. Each citizen has access to certain locations depending on their archetype.


Infiltrate and reclaim what is yours

Experience heart-pounding stealth gameplay where you use a diverse set of abilities to outsmart your siblings' relentless followers. Create distractions with the infection, scan your surroundings with the pulse, get into hard-to-reach areas by teleporting. Combine these skills to find new ways to overcome each situation.


Find how your legacy has changed

Play as the villain and delve into the depths of Trumana's dark past, where ancient conflicts and sibling rivalries shape the present.







This game is a university project by videogame students at U-tad.
